string-array.name: whats_new_items
string-array.item: Added timer.
Added repeat options in alarm settings. Can repeat an alarm by hours, days, weeks, or months.
Added date option to have an alarm run on a particular date. Accessible when selecting a time.
Added snooze with volume buttons.
Added dismiss NFC tags in order if multiple NFC tags are selected. Can be dismissed in any, random, or sequential order.
Added dismiss early notification. Optionally show a notification when an alarm can be dismissed early.
Added long press on the repeat, vibrate, NFC, and flashlight buttons to quickly access those options.
Fixed issue where playing all the music in a folder did not work.
Updated to support Android 15.
Updated to support Android\'s Material 3 theme.
Fixed issue where skip next alarm would keep skipping the alarm.
Fixed issue with voice where text-to-speech was using the default voice even though a different voice was selected.
Added alignment option to the widget to align all text.
Added position option to the widget to position the alarm text.
Added only show app alarms option to the widget which controls whether only alarms created in this app will be shown, or alarms created in any app will be shown.
Added information on the remaining number of snoozes when swiping to snooze an active alarm.
Updated look of the What\'s New dialog.
Added feature to select multiple NFC tags that can dismiss an alarm.
Added speech rate to text-to-speech option to change the speed that it will speak.
Fixed an issue with flashlight where, when blink was disabled, it would still blink.
Updated alarm card look to show buttons for dismiss options, snooze options, and regular alarm options.
Added custom vibration pattern option for alarms.
Added battery saver option to keep the screen off when an alarm is active. Found in Settings > General.
Added voice option to text-to-speech to choose which voice to use.
